msbt.message: You're going treasure hunting? If you find a fossil of a yummy dessert, can I lick it?I wanna taste prehistoric flavors
That umbrella you have is so cool!It really tells the world, "Hey! I'm someone who knows exactly how damp I want to be."
You look like a lumberjack holding that axe! It's a good look.
Whaddaya do with your slingshot? I blast balloon presents with mine!Do ya know where the present balloons come from? There's a sea monster near here that burps them!I call him Lieutenant Burpy Boy!
You can transform yourself with one flick of that wand, right?I'm so jealous! Whatcha gonna change into, ?If it was me, I'd change into some pajamas. That way I could take a long nap!
It's crazy to think how a road goes from one place to anotherbut really, it never goes anywhere at all. The road is ALWAYS right where you expect it. <10_4 />Really makes ya think
Do you think a cliff would look real neat here, ?I bet would look pretty WOW from a clifftop!

I had this idea to dig a moat around my house, just like a castle!Huh Land surrounded by water is an island And moats are water that surrounds landSo a moat around your house means you'd live on an islandTHAT'S ON ANOTHER ISLAND! <10_4 />That's nuts
Is that a party popper?<10_4 /> I love those things!The popping is fun, but I'm REALLY in it for the mess they make!
You've got a ladder! I love ladders. Ladders make ya taller than you are without needing to buy new legs!
A vaulting pole! I had one of them, but it was really super busted.Every time I'd try to vault over the river, it'd drop me right in the water! Oh well, I met a lot of fish that way.
Ooh! Is that one of those tweeter things? I just love those.I bet if you blew on it till you ran outta breath, you'd get a pretty good workout without ever standing up!
That's a nice bubble blower you got there. I've got a few bubble blowers of my own, . Of course, I just call them straws.
Pinwheels are cute, but you gotta be careful not to fall for their charm.One time I watched one spin for, like, six straight hours. It took almost three weeks to fully undizzy myself.
Hey, where'd you get that uchiwa-style fan, man?That's one of those things you never think you need until you need one. Then you don't know where to find it!
That thingy you're holding is a sparkler, !I love everything about sparklers. The look of 'em. The feel of 'em. Even the smell of 'em. What? That's not weird.

Tell me there's a story behind that balloon, .It's so cute how it just follows you around everywhere you go.I never really thought about it, but a balloon would make a pretty perfect pet, They're loyal, clean, cheerful, and, best of all, they wouldn't steal your right off the table!
That net in your hand You catching bugs, ?They're real good at hiding by the flowers and trees. I hope you find them.The trick to bug catching is being super sneaky!
Did you find the bug you were after? I remember the day I caught MY first bug!It was just a normal butterfly, but to me, it was like magic.
How's it going with those bugs? Practice makes perfect, so swing that net at everything.

Wow, you've gotten real good at catching bugs.I knew it was the hobby for you the first time I saw a net in your hands.I've seen folks with nets and said, "Who gave them a net? Somebody take that thing away!" <10_4 />True story.

What?! You've caught all the bugs?! Not a lot of folks do that, so I don't do this for a lot of folksWoogie buggy woogie buggy! Buzz buzz buzz! Buggy woogie buggy woogie! Buzz buzz buzz!I hope you feel, like, real proud. And stuff. I hope my dance didn't, a huh huh huhdidn't BUG YOU!
Did you find the fish you want?I get so sleepy when I'm fishing.Sometimes I get worried that if I doze off, the fish will make fun of me!

I just heard that there are different types of fish in different waters?That's kinda nuts, right?<10_4 /> I hope I can meet all the fish types one day!GlurglgeblurgWow! Now my tummy's talking about fish too!
Hmm If only I were as good at fishing as you are, .Maybe I'll sneak some practice in at night.<10_4 /> The fish'll never see it coming!
I think the secret to being a good fisher is to have fish charisma.I want to be popular with the fish like you are, . What's your secret?
You caught all the fish types?!<10_4 /> Are there that many fish types? Wow, you must really love fish.Congrats to , the fishiest person I know, !
Are you watering the flowers? Do ya think they mind taking a shower in public?

? <10_4 />Didja know it's raining?<10_4 /> Didja know rain is water?<10_4 /> Didja know you're pouring water?Didja know I'm confused?<10_4 /> Didja know I'm wet?<10_4 /> Didja know the flowers are wet?Didja know you're wet?I wanted to know if ya knew that stuff, 'cause I don't know what's going on and I was hoping you did.
